member.summary: Supporting methods for restoring sets of projects that implement . This code is used by Visual Studio to execute restores for solutions that have mixtures of UWP project.json, packages.config, and PackageReference-type projects.
Restore a solution and cache the dg spec to context.

Restore a dg spec. This will not update the context cache.
Restore without writing the lock file
